description: Sein has the idea of using the spell for profit by charging people who need tough oil stains removed from their pots and pans. However, because they offer to clean the first pot or pan for free, everyone only brings one pot or pan, and it ends up being volunteer work for Frieren.

titles.title: OO Magic Episode 6: The Magic That Removes Persistent Oil Stains
OO no Mahou Dai 6 Kai: Shitsukoi Abura Yogore o Otosu Mahou
●●の魔法 第6回: しつこい油汚れを落とす魔法
